sentences.cn: 研究者之一 、 特拉维夫大学的妇产科教授MosheHod说.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the clinical features, diagnosis and management of acute intravascular coagulation ( DIC ) in obstetrics.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨产科急性 DIC 的临床特点及诊断治疗方法.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the effect of human resources reorganization on nursing management in gynaecology and obstetrics.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨人力资源重组在妇产科护理管理中的运用效果和方法.

sentences.en: Objectives : To discuss the difference of PBL model and traditional obstetrics and gynecology education.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨PBL教学法与传统教学模式的教学效果差异.

sentences.en: Objectives: Final report succeed resuee 11 cases clinical realize about gynecology and obstetrics disseminated intravascular coagulation ( DIC ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 总结妇科与产科弥散性血管内凝血 ( DIC ) 抢救成功11例体会.

sentences.en: Postpartum hemorrhage is a common serious complication in obstetrics.
sentences.cn: 产后出血是产科常见的严重并发症.

sentences.en: Psychological factors are close related to the diseases department of obstetrics & gynecology .
sentences.cn: 心理因素与 妇产科 疾病关系十分密切.

sentences.en: She brought her children into the world at a time when obstetrics was a primitive art.
sentences.cn: 她生孩子的时候,产科学还是一门原始医术.

sentences.en: Surgical training takes at least nine years, or 11 in the case of obstetrics.
sentences.cn: 外科至少需要9年的专业训练，产科甚至需要11年。

sentences.en: The internal thermal line printer makes the system applicable to clinical obstetrics.
sentences.cn: 内置的热敏行式打印机增强了系统的功能,更方便产科临床应用.

sentences.en: The training covers extended periods in obstetrics and gynaecology.
sentences.cn: 该培训包括产科学和妇科学的增加课时。

sentences.en: These are three stories happened in a general obstetrics and gynecology clinic.
sentences.cn: 这是在一家普通妇产科诊所发生的三段故事.
